Jollibee Breakfast Menu

Start your day with Jollibee's delicious breakfast offerings. From traditional Filipino favorites to hearty morning meals, we have everything you need for a perfect start to your day.

Breakfast Menu Prices - June 2025 Updated

Enjoy our freshly prepared breakfast items served with garlic rice and your choice of beverages. Perfect for busy mornings or leisurely weekend brunches.

View Complete Breakfast Menu

Longganisa Breakfast

Sweet and savory Filipino sausage served with garlic rice and fried egg. A traditional breakfast favorite that brings comfort and satisfaction.

Order Now

Tapa Breakfast

Tender, marinated beef tapa with garlic rice and fried egg. A protein-rich breakfast that will keep you energized throughout the morning.

Order Now

Corned Beef Breakfast

Hearty corned beef with garlic rice and fried egg. A filling breakfast option that's perfect for those who need a substantial morning meal.

Order Now

Spam Breakfast

Crispy fried spam with garlic rice and fried egg. A quick and tasty breakfast option that's loved by many Filipinos.

Order Now

Hotdog Breakfast

Juicy hotdog with garlic rice and fried egg. A simple yet satisfying breakfast that's perfect for kids and adults alike.

Order Now

Breakfast Burger

Special breakfast burger with egg, cheese, and your choice of meat. A modern twist on the traditional breakfast meal.

Order Now

Pancakes

Fluffy pancakes served with butter and syrup. A sweet breakfast treat that's perfect for those who prefer lighter morning meals.

Order Now

Breakfast Combo Meals

Complete breakfast combos that include your main dish, rice, egg, and beverage. Great value for a complete morning meal.

Order Now
